TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWithSystemAssignedIdentityBasedAccess`1<FluentT> implements class Microsoft.Azure.Management.ResourceManager.Fluent.Core.IBeta
Public Interface IWithSystemAssignedIdentityBasedAccess(Of FluentT) Implements IBeta

Docs.summary: The stage of the System Assigned (Local) Managed Service Identity enabled web app allowing to set access role for the identity.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.AppService.Fluent.WebAppBase.Update.IUpdate`1<!FluentT> WithSystemAssignedIdentityBasedAccessTo(string resourceId, class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Graph.RBAC.Fluent.BuiltInRole role) cil managed
Public Function WithSystemAssignedIdentityBasedAccessTo (resourceId As String, role As BuiltInRole) As IUpdate(Of FluentT)

Docs.param: The ARM identifier of the resource.
Access role to assigned to the web app's local identity.
Docs.summary: Specifies that web app's system assigned (local) identity should have the given access (described by the role) on an ARM resource identified by the resource ID. Applications running on the web app will have the same permission (role) on the ARM resource.
Docs.return: The next stage of the update.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.AppService.Fluent.WebAppBase.Update.IUpdate`1<!FluentT> WithSystemAssignedIdentityBasedAccessTo(string resourceId, string roleDefinitionId) cil managed
Public Function WithSystemAssignedIdentityBasedAccessTo (resourceId As String, roleDefinitionId As String) As IUpdate(Of FluentT)

Docs.param: Scope of the access represented in ARM resource ID format.
Access role definition to assigned to the web app's local identity.
Docs.summary: Specifies that web app's system assigned (local) identity should have the access (described by the role definition) on an ARM resource identified by the resource ID. Applications running on the web app will have the same permission (role) on the ARM resource.
Docs.return: The next stage of the update.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.AppService.Fluent.WebAppBase.Update.IUpdate`1<!FluentT> WithSystemAssignedIdentityBasedAccessToCurrentResourceGroup(class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Graph.RBAC.Fluent.BuiltInRole role) cil managed
Public Function WithSystemAssignedIdentityBasedAccessToCurrentResourceGroup (role As BuiltInRole) As IUpdate(Of FluentT)

Docs.param: Access role to assigned to the web app's local identity.
Docs.summary: Specifies that web app's system assigned (local) identity should have the given access (described by the role) on the resource group that web app resides. Applications running on the web app will have the same permission (role) on the resource group.
Docs.return: The next stage of the update.

Docs.summary: Specifies that web app's system assigned (local) identity should have the access (described by the role definition) on the resource group that web app resides. Applications running on the web app will have the same permission (role) on the resource group.
Docs.return: The next stage of the update.
